questions.question: たなかさんは　へや（＿）　入ります。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～に 入ります - to enter (a place)

へや - room

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「へやに入ります」 means "enter the room."

  • を - not used with "入る" (though commonly misunderstood)
  • が - subject marker
  • と - "with", not suitable here
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is に.

  • を - not used with "入る" (though commonly misunderstood)
  • が - subject marker
  • と - "with", not suitable here

questions.question: 駅（＿）　人が　たくさん　います。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～に - indicates the place where an action/state happens

駅 - station

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「駅に人がいます」 means "There are people at the station."

  • で - is used to indicate the place where you do something
  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is に.

  • で - is used to indicate the place where you do something
  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker

questions.question: 毎朝　六時（＿）　おきます。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～に - indicates time when something happens

六時 - six o’clock

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「六時におきます」 means "I wake up at six."

  • で - place marker
  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is に.

  • で - place marker
  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker

questions.question: 日曜日は　母と　スーパー（＿）　行きます。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～に 行きます - to go to a place

スーパー - supermarket

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「スーパーに行きます」 means "go to the supermarket."

  • で - place of action, not destination
  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is に.

  • で - place of action, not destination
  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker

questions.question: かばんの　中（＿）　本が　あります。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～に あります - shows where something exists (non-living)

中 - inside

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「中にあります」 means "There is (something) inside."

  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker
  • と - "and" or "with"
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is に.

  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker
  • と - "and" or "with"
